detail_description: Restaurante Deliciosa Marta is a cozy restaurant in Gran Canaria that offers traditional island cuisine with a touch of love in every dish. Located near Triana Street, it's the perfect place to end a cultural day in the city. This top-class restaurant is known for its exceptional service, impeccable dining area, and incredible cuisine. The menu features must-try dishes like steak tartare, truffled gnocchi, and fresh salads.
name: Restaurante Deliciosa Marta
address: C. Escritor Benito Pérez Galdós, 33, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Casa Brito is a popular restaurant located in Arucas, Gran Canaria, offering a diverse menu suitable for children, adults, and those with special dietary requirements. The restaurant is known for its wide variety of delicious food options including meats and vegetables with honey. It provides an attractive ambiance and spacious setting. Casa Brito is highly recommended for meat lovers and gourmet food enthusiasts. Visitors can expect high-quality dishes, excellent service, and a good price-quality ratio.
name: Casa Brito
address: Pje. Ter, 17, 35412 Arucas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Los Guayres is a Michelin-starred dining destination located within the serene Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa. Chef Alexis Alvarez showcases his modern approach to traditional Canarian cuisine, offering a menu that beautifully balances familiarity with innovation. The restaurant's tasting menu takes diners on a journey through the rich flavors of the Canary Islands, featuring exquisite dishes such as slow-cooked Canarian goat and locally sourced fresh fish.
name: Restaurante Los Guayres
address: Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa, Avenida de Los Marrero, 2, Puerto de Mogán, 35138 Lomo Quiebre, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Sophisticated tasting menus presented in a long-running venue with poolside tables at a resort.
detail_description: Nestled in the south of Gran Canaria, La Aquarela is a renowned restaurant offering a sophisticated dining experience. The menu features gourmet seasonal dishes, including options like cream of lobster and sautéed king prawns with scallops. With an elegant atmosphere and poolside tables, this Michelin-starred gem provides a unique culinary journey. Executive chef German Ortega's international influences combined with Canarian flavors create an unforgettable dining experience.
name: Restaurante la Aquarela
address: Apartamentos Aquamarina Barranco de la Verga s/n, 35129 Barranco de la Verga, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Ibéricos J.Cruz is a cozy tapas restaurant located in the suburb of Playa del Ingles, Bellavista. The restaurant offers a slightly upscale setting and serves traditional Spanish tapas in a familiar and satisfying manner. With both indoor and outdoor seating, it's recommended to make reservations for dinner due to its popularity, especially on weekends.
name: Ibéricos J.Cruz
address: Calle placido domingo 23, edificio parque sur 2, bellavista, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Casa Romántica Agaete is a charming restaurant located in the Agaete Valley, offering a delightful dining experience. The establishment prides itself on using locally sourced ingredients, including bread from Ingenio, olive oil from Telde, and salt from Salinas de Bocacangrejo. After undergoing extensive refurbishment, the restaurant has reopened with a new menu that sets it apart from typical offerings in the area.
name: Restaurante Casa Romántica Agaete
address: Carretera de los Berrazales, Km 3, 5, 35480, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: El Churrasco is a renowned restaurant with three locations in Meloneras Boulevard El Faro, Las Palmas, and Tenerife. It's a paradise for meat enthusiasts, offering an array of grilled Argentinean-style cuts in an elegant yet inviting setting. With nearly 20 years of history, this establishment is dedicated to serving top-quality meats prepared to perfection.
name: El Churrasco
address: Anexo Hotel Lopesan Costa Meloneras Bulevar de Meloneras, C. Mar Mediterráneo, s/n, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant neighborhood of Triana, Restaurante Allende Triana is a delightful culinary gem that perfectly blends modern aesthetics with traditional Canarian flavors. The restaurant boasts a bright and airy ambiance, characterized by its chic monochrome decor and high ceilings adorned with whimsical sketches of trams and light bulbs. Here, diners can indulge in an array of delectable dishes ranging from classic Canarian tapas like papas arrugadas to international favorites such as Hawaiian poke and fresh salads.
name: Restaurante Allende Triana
address: C. Domingo J Navarro, 16, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: El Santo Restaurante is a popular dining spot located in the headliner resort of Las Palmas, known for its charming ambiance and creative flair. The interior features modern designs with exposed-stone passageways adorned with palm-print wallpaper and vibrant graphic art, attracting a savvy crowd of food enthusiasts.
name: El Santo Restaurante
address: C. Escritor Benito Pérez Galdós, 23, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Casa Josefina is a quaint, family-operated bochinche in Las Palmas that exudes a warm and inviting ambiance. The establishment boasts a charming rustic interior adorned with hanging lanterns and jugs, complemented by checkered tables. This hidden gem offers an authentic dining experience away from the tourist crowds. The must-try dishes include their renowned roast leg of lamb, which is accompanied by deliciously thick-cut chips.
name: Casa Josefina
address: C. Tindaya, 7, 35018 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Fishy tapas, catch of the day & seafood paella in a large venue with views of the bay & a terrace.
detail_description: Restaurante La Marinera is a casual seafood restaurant with a large venue offering views of the bay and a terrace. Despite its slightly dated dining room, it remains popular among locals and visitors for its fresh grilled seafood and seafood paella. The restaurant's location on a rocky outcrop provides stunning Atlantic views during the day and beautiful sunset reflections in the evening.
name: Restaurante La Marinera
address: C. de Alonso de Ojeda, 0, 35009 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in a beautifully restored historic building, Valle de Mogán Restaurante exudes an enchanting old-world allure, making it the perfect setting for special celebrations. The restaurant offers breathtaking views of the valley and a romantic ambiance. Executive chef Chema Marrero skillfully crafts a menu that fuses contemporary Canarian cuisine. Guests can indulge in some of the finest food on Gran Canaria while enjoying stunning mountain vistas from the terrace.
name: Valle de Mogán Restaurante
address: Los Pasitos, 2, 35140 Mogán, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Relaxed restaurant preparing elevated steak & seafood dishes, plus gourmet desserts.
detail_description: Restaurante LoLa is a relaxed yet sophisticated dining spot located in southern Maspalomas, amidst the desert-like dunes and upscale hotels. The restaurant draws inspiration from various cultures including Mexico, Japan, Peru, and Italy to create elevated steak and seafood dishes as well as gourmet desserts. The menu features whimsical takes on ceviche, tapas, risotto, and more using locally sourced seafood, herbs, and vegetables from the Canaries.
name: Restaurante LoLa
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 17, Edificio Barbados, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: The Fuji Japanese Restaurant is a popular spot for diners looking for sushi, sashimi and other Japanese dishes. It offers an elegant setting with Japanese-inspired design elements, and the food is top-quality. The prices are reasonable, and the staff are friendly and knowledgeable.
name: Fuji Restaurant
address: C. Pedro Castillo Westerling, 20, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Bar-Restaurante Tagoror
address: GC-103, 21, 35260 Ingenio, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming port area of Puerto Rico de Gran Canaria, Grill Costa Mar is a delightful family-run eatery that captures the essence of coastal dining. With its laid-back vibe and stunning sea views, this restaurant specializes in an array of grilled fresh fish and seafood dishes, including mouthwatering paella and succulent king prawns. What sets Grill Costa Mar apart is its commitment to quality ingredients, often infused with a unique Basque twist that elevates traditional flavors.
name: Grill Costa Mar
address: C. Puerto Base, 10, 35130 Mogán, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Etiopico Afrika is a surprising gem in Maspalomas, offering some of the best Ethiopian cuisine in Spain. The menu features a variety of traditional dishes, including lentil stews, split pea purees, and doro wat served on spongy injera bread. With a focus on vegan- and vegetarian-friendly options, the restaurant caters to different dietary preferences.
name: Restaurante Etiopico Afrika
address: C.C LAS RAMBLAS CENT, Av. Juan Carlos I, S/N, LOC, 35019 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming locale of Patalavaca, "Restaurante Grill Cueva Pirata" is a culinary gem that steak lovers simply cannot miss. Renowned for its exceptional meat offerings, this contemporary steakhouse has garnered a loyal following among both locals and travelers alike. The restaurant's reputation as one of the finest steakhouses in the Canary Islands is well-deserved, with patrons raving about their perfectly cooked ribeye steaks and impressive 800g T-bone dishes.
name: Restaurante Grill Cueva Pirata
address: Avenida Los Canarios 2, Patalavaca, 35129 Arguineguín, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Relaxed tapas bar serving classic small plates & wine in a simple space with wood partitions.
detail_description: La Tapita Los Jose's is a laid-back eatery that specializes in traditional Spanish small plates and wine. The restaurant features a minimalistic interior with wooden partitions, creating a simple yet cozy atmosphere. Located beside the Parroquia de San Fernando, it offers an authentic experience of the city's culture. With its diverse menu of international cuisine, it attracts customers seeking unique and flavorful dishes. Notable items include delicious Spanish tapas, gambas al ajillo, and calamari.
name: La Tapita Los Jose's
address: C. Plácido Domingo, 12, local 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Bar El Boya, located in El Pajar in Arguineguin, offers delicious and affordable fish dishes. Despite its proximity to a large cement factory, the restaurant's location on a pebble beach adds to its unique charm. Open daily for breakfast and lunch, with dinner available only on Friday and Saturday nights until 23:30, it's a popular spot among locals for its generous portions of seafood at reasonable prices.
name: Bar El Boya
address: Calle Santa Agueda, 32, 35120 Arguineguín, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Capitán is a must-visit for those craving Spanish and Mediterranean cuisine in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. The restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with its fresh Atlantic seafood served right by the shore, providing stunning beach views through panoramic windows or on the terrace with the refreshing sea breeze. Visitors praise the friendly staff and recommend trying locally sourced steak at an affordable price while enjoying amazing sea views from the garden. It's definitely worth checking out when visiting Gran Canaria!
name: Restaurante El Capitán
address: Playa de, C. las Acacias, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Qué leche! is a popular dining spot in Triana, known for its friendly service and delectable dishes. The restaurant was initially intended to be a coffee shop but evolved into a full-fledged dining establishment offering breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner. With a menu featuring boneless suckling pig with sweet potato puree, Cuban-style rice nigiris, and broken eggs with shrimp, among other culinary delights, it's advisable to make reservations due to its popularity.
name: Restaurante Qué leche!
address: C. Torres, 22, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Understated restaurant offering upscale, innovative specialties & tasting menus.
detail_description: Restaurante El Equilibrista 33, led by Chef Mario Rodriguez, is a one-Michelin-starred dining destination that skillfully blends traditional Canarian tastes with modern innovation. The name "The Tightrope Walker" reflects the restaurant's approach to delicately balancing flavors, textures, and techniques to craft dishes that are both inventive and rooted in local culinary traditions.
name: El Equilibrista 33
address: C. Ing. Salinas, 23, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled within the elegant confines of Hotel Santa Catalina, Poemas by Hermanos Padrón is a culinary gem that embodies old-world charm and modern sophistication. This Michelin-starred restaurant invites guests to embark on an exquisite 14-course tasting journey crafted by the talented Padron brothers. Each dish is thoughtfully designed to narrate a story through flavors, showcasing the essence of Canarian cuisine with a contemporary twist.
name: Poemas by Hermanos Padrón
address: Santa Catalina, a Royal Hideaway Hotel, C. León y Castillo, 227, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante Acaymo
address: Los Pasitos, 23, 35140 Los Pasitos, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Abrasa Grill, located in San Fernando, Gran Canaria, is a must-visit for meat lovers. Despite its unassuming dining room, the kitchen serves up a variety of mouthwatering char-grilled meats such as lomo alto and Argentine-style chorizo with chimichurri. Vegetarians will also find a substantial selection of non-meat tapas to enjoy. The restaurant's friendly hosts and clean environment contribute to its excellent reputation.
name: Abrasa Grill
address: C. Secundino Delgado, 5, 35100 San Fernando, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Samsara is a unique and romantic restaurant located in the popular tourist town of Maspalomas in Gran Canaria. Specializing in Asian fusion cuisine, it offers a captivating dining experience with dishes influenced by Indian flavors. The restaurant's interior is adorned with exotic trinkets, creating a welcoming atmosphere for families. Samsara's small sharing plates allow children to explore new flavors, including fragrant Thai curries, samosas, and grilled meats.
name: Samsara
address: C.C. La Charca, Av. del Oasis, 30, 2º, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante 360° is a high-end dining establishment located atop the Bohemia Suites and Spa in Playa del Ingles, offering a love letter to Canarian specialties with carefully presented dishes such as suckling pig and rabbit rice. The restaurant features curvaceous interiors in vibrant colors, a grand piano at the center, and neon signage on the walls. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the Gran Canarian coastline from high-floor tables or outdoor balcony seating while sampling top-quality local cuisine.
name: Restaurante 360°
address: Hotel Bohemia Suites & Spa, Av. Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante Caserón Del Cortijo
address: Camino del Golf, 1, 35218 Telde, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Maximilians Restaurant is located in a prime area of the island, offering a unique experience and ambiance. While some may find the prices relatively high, it's worth it for the overall feel and quality. The restaurant provides a variety of delicious dishes, including lasagna, chips, chicken Caesar salad, and calzone. The scenic views complement the friendly staff and attentive service. It's an ideal spot to enjoy a glass of wine along with some snacks.
name: Maximilians
address: AC Boulevard El Faro, local 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Punta Yacht Club is situated at the far end of Pasito Blanco harbor, within a gated community. During August, it's exclusive to members, but in other months, visitors can enjoy lunch or dinner at the restaurant with a refreshing sea breeze. The club offers a variety of Canarian dishes such as Canarian potatoes with mojo sauce and fried Moray chips.
name: La Punta Yacht Club
address: Puerto Deportivo S/N, 35106 Pasito Blanco, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Taste Restaurant Gran Canaria is a charming little place offering a variety of high-quality dishes. The owner, who personally endorses each dish on the menu, ensures that guests have a fantastic dining experience. The food is generally good, and the wine selection is reasonably priced. Guests can opt for individual plates and wine selections rather than set courses for a more personalized experience. With incredible food and friendly owners, this restaurant offers an excellent alternative to standard menus in the area.
name: Taste Mesón Restaurant Gran Canaria
address: Paseo De Las Marañuelas, 1, 35120 Arguineguín, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Guirlache is a renowned pasteleria located in the Triana neighborhood of Las Palmas, with a history dating back to 1973. Despite its unassuming appearance, it offers some of the best ice cream in town, including the popular chocolate nougat flavor. The shop also boasts a wide variety of delectable chocolates such as praline bonbons and takeaway-ready tartaletas at affordable prices.
name: Guirlache
address: Calle Triana, 68, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Puerto De Laguete is a popular dining spot in Agaete, Gran Canaria. It offers a spacious interior and a small terrace for guests to enjoy their meals. The restaurant is known for its delicious seafood and Mediterranean cuisine. With a good menu selection, it's considered one of the top dining options in the area.
name: Restaurante Puerto De Laguete
address: Calle Ntra. Sra. de las Nieves, 9, 35489 Puerto de las Nieves, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Located in the charming old quarter of Galdar, La Trastienda de Chago is a delightful restaurant that promises a blend of pleasure and exquisite dining. This cozy establishment stands out for its innovative use of local ingredients, offering a modern twist on traditional Canarian dishes. The menu features delectable options such as beef stew infused with contemporary flavors, Asian-inspired black pig, and grilled mushrooms.
name: La Trastienda de Chago
address: C. Andamana, 5, 35460 Gáldar, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante Nelson
address: Av. Polizón, 47, 35118 Arinaga, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante Ribera del Río Miño
address: C. Olof Palme, 21, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Cuernocabra is a restaurant in Las Palmas that stands out for using locally sourced ingredients from Gran Canaria and other Canary Islands. The modern setting and street food concept are appealing to many visitors. The establishment offers a unique blend of traditional Canary Island cuisine with a contemporary touch, making it a favorite dining spot for locals and tourists alike. Guests can enjoy watching the preparation of dishes at the bar, adding to the overall experience.
name: Cuernocabra
address: Avda, Av. José Mesa y López, 15, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Family-friendly theme park & museum overlooking a gorge & recreating an ancient Canarian village.
detail_description: Mundo Aborigen is a family-friendly theme park and museum located near Playa del Ingles, offering a captivating recreation of an ancient Canarian village. The outdoor park provides an enriching experience, allowing visitors to delve into the rich history, culture, and traditions of the former residents of the Canary Islands. With its stunning views overlooking a gorge, Mundo Aborigen offers educational tours that provide insight into how the original inhabitants lived.
name: Mundo Aborigen
address: 35107 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Creative tasting menus, wine pairings & fine Spanish cuisine at a rustic-chic dining room & terrace.
detail_description: Calma Chicha Restaurant is a rustic-chic dining venue offering creative tasting menus, fine Spanish cuisine, and wine pairings. Located just a short walk from the town center, it boasts an elegant and quiet atmosphere. The upstairs terrace provides a beautiful candlelit setting at night. The menu features traditional dishes with influences from Asian, Arabic, and South American cuisines.
name: Calma Chicha Restaurant
address: Av. de Tirajana, 4, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Triciclo Bar is a charming restaurant located in the old town of Vegueta, offering a unique fusion of Mediterranean and Spanish cuisines. The restaurant provides a new flavor experience by putting a twist on classic dishes. Guests can enjoy dining indoors with a view of the open kitchen or outdoors on the peaceful street, making it an ideal setting for a romantic meal. While some find the food to be delicious and creative, others note that deep-fried items can be heavy.
name: Triciclo
address: C. Pelota, 12, 35001 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Neodimio 60 is a small and charming nueva cocina restaurant that offers a decadent feast of local seafood, meats, and vegetables with Latin and Asian twists. The menu changes frequently, offering unique dishes like chipotle-rubbed octopus and cod ceviche with passion fruit and ginger. The cocktails are described as 'cheffy' and the service is excellent.
name: Neodimio 60
address: C. Alfredo L Jones, 28, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Rubia is a popular restaurant located at Melenara beach, 20km away from Las Palmas. It's known for its traditional and tasty recipes, offering the best quality in fresh products. The gofios escaldados made with the best broth and gofio are a must-try, showcasing creaminess and rich flavor. While not a fancy place, it surprises visitors with exceptional food and great service.
name: La Rubia
address: C. Luis Morote, 47, 35214 Playa de Melenara, Las Palmas, Spain

name: MAjUGA Restaurante
address: C. Escritor Benito Pérez Galdós, 41, 35002 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of the city, Restaurante Los 5 Sentidos is a culinary gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience. Known for its vibrant and hearty dishes, this eatery offers a menu bursting with creativity. From unique options like melon ravioli paired with blue cheese and walnuts to refreshing courgette carpaccio drizzled with parmesan and parsley, there's something to tantalize every palate.
name: Restaurante Los 5 Sentidos
address: C. Armas, 13, 35001 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

name: El Churrasco Las Palmas
address: C. Olof Palme, 33, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

name: @bululucanarias
address: C. Venezuela, 4, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Argentinian empanadas & grilled meats, plus robust red wines, in a relaxed steakhouse.
detail_description: El Almacén GC is a steakhouse in Gran Canaria that offers delicious Argentinian empanadas, grilled meats, and robust red wines. It is the perfect place to relax after visiting Mezquita De Las Palmas. The restaurant is known for its mouthwatering dishes such as churrasco and steaks. The ambiance is laid-back, and the service provided by the two brothers who run the restaurant is exceptional.
name: El Almacén
address: C. Pascal, 22, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Las Palmas, El Novillo Precoz is a must-visit for meat enthusiasts exploring Gran Canaria. Just a stone's throw away from The Lofito, this charming restaurant boasts an inviting atmosphere adorned with antique furniture and nostalgic photographs. Renowned for its exceptional cuts of Argentinian and Uruguayan beef, El Novillo Precoz has become a culinary staple since its inception by Uruguayan owners right here in the city.
name: El Novillo Precoz
address: C. Portugal, 9, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Corazón de Venezuela
address: Frente al Parking 🅿, C. Luis Morote, 50, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Spain
